argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lincvalsn.b | |- B = ( Base ` M ) |
| 2 |  | lincvalsn.s | |- S = ( Scalar ` M ) |
| 3 |  | lincvalsn.r | |- R = ( Base ` S ) |
| 4 |  | lincvalsn.t | |- .x. = ( .s ` M ) |
| 5 |  | lincvalsn.f | |- F = { <. V , Y >. } |
| 6 | 5 | #P_oveq1i | |- ( F ( linC ` M ) { V } ) = ( { <. V , Y >. } ( linC ` M ) { V } ) |
| 7 | 1, 2, 3, 4 | #P_lincvalsng | |- ( ( M e. LMod /\ V e. B /\ Y e. R ) -> ( { <. V , Y >. } ( linC ` M ) { V } ) = ( Y .x. V ) ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_syl5eq | |- ( ( M e. LMod /\ V e. B /\ Y e. R ) -> ( F ( linC ` M ) { V } ) = ( Y .x. V ) ) |
